NMF Standalone
  • standalone_nmf module
  • View page source

standalone_nmf module

standalone_nmf.process_turkish_file(df, desired_columns, tokenizer=None, tokenizer_type=None)[source]

Process Turkish text data through the complete preprocessing pipeline.

Parameters:

  • df (pandas.DataFrame) – Input dataframe containing Turkish text

  • desired_columns (str) – Column name containing text to analyze

  • tokenizer (optional) – Pre-trained tokenizer object

  • tokenizer_type (str) – Either “bpe” or “wordpiece”

Returns:

(tdm, sozluk, sayisal_veri, tokenizer)

  • tdm: TF-IDF document-term matrix

  • sozluk: Vocabulary list

  • sayisal_veri: Numerical representation of documents

  • tokenizer: Trained tokenizer object

Return type:

tuple

standalone_nmf.process_english_file(df, desired_columns, lemmatize)[source]

Process English text data with lemmatization and dictionary-based approaches.

Parameters:

  • df (pandas.DataFrame) – Input dataframe containing English text

  • desired_columns (str) – Column name containing text to analyze

  • lemmatize (bool) – Whether to apply lemmatization

Returns:

(tdm, sozluk, sayisal_veri)

  • tdm: TF-IDF document-term matrix (same as sayisal_veri)

  • sozluk: Dictionary/vocabulary of terms

  • sayisal_veri: TF-IDF weighted document-term matrix

Return type:

tuple

standalone_nmf.process_file(filepath, table_name, desired_columns, options)[source]

Complete topic modeling pipeline from file input to results.

Parameters:

  • filepath (str) – Path to input CSV/Excel file

  • table_name (str) – Unique identifier for this analysis run

  • desired_columns (str) – Column name containing text data

  • options (dict) – Configuration dictionary containing: - LANGUAGE (str): “TR” for Turkish, “EN” for English - DESIRED_TOPIC_COUNT (int): Number of topics to extract - N_TOPICS (int): Number of top words per topic to display - tokenizer_type (str): “bpe” or “wordpiece” for Turkish - nmf_type (str): “nmf” or “opnmf” algorithm choice - LEMMATIZE (bool): Enable lemmatization (mainly for English) - gen_topic_distribution (bool): Generate topic distribution plots - gen_cloud (bool): Generate word clouds - save_excel (bool): Export results to Excel

Returns:

Results containing:

  • state: “SUCCESS” or “FAILURE”

  • message: Status message

  • data_name: Analysis identifier

  • topic_word_scores: Topic-word associations

Return type:

dict

standalone_nmf.run_standalone_nmf(filepath, table_name, desired_columns, options)[source]

Simplified entry point for NMF topic modeling.

Parameters:

  • filepath (str) – Path to input file

  • table_name (str) – Analysis identifier

  • desired_columns (str) – Text column name

  • options (dict) – Configuration dictionary containing: - LEMMATIZE (bool): Enable lemmatization - N_TOPICS (int): Words per topic - DESIRED_TOPIC_COUNT (int): Number of topics to extract - tokenizer_type (str): “bpe” or “wordpiece” for Turkish - nmf_type (str): “nmf” or “opnmf” algorithm choice - LANGUAGE (str): “TR” for Turkish, “EN” for English - separator (str): CSV separator character - gen_topic_distribution (bool): Generate distribution plots

Returns:

Process results with timing information

Return type:

dict
